titleStmt.title: A funerall elegie on the unfortunate death of that worthy major Edward Grey, Iuly 26. 1644.
titleStmt.author: J. A.

publicationStmt.publisher: for I.W. at the old Baylie,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Sad prodigy! Can famous valiant Grey ..."
Imperfect: Stained, affecting imprint; imprint suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
